typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		help as string,
		success as boolean,
		result as (include_total as boolean, resource_id as string, fields as (type as string, id as string)[], records_format as string, records as ({_id} as string, Ilce as string, {2015.0} as string, {2016.0} as string, {2017.0} as string, {2018.0} as string, {2019.0} as string)[], limit as string, {_links} as (start as string, next as string), total as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
Select1 derive(result = result.records) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		result
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		id = result[1].{_id},
		Ilce = result[1].Ilce,
		{2015} = result[1].{2015.0},
		{2016} = result[1].{2016.0},
		{2017} = result[1].{2017.0},
		{2018} = result[1].{2018.0},
		{2019} = result[1].{2019.0}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
